summary: A Computer Science graduate with a strong academic record, achieving a GPA of Great Distinction. Experienced in freelance work, demonstrating dedication and a strong work ethic. Proficient in programming with hands-on experience from rigorous personal and academic courses, including a challenging Software Engineering course. Committed to continuous learning and excellence in the tech industry.

experience.title: SOFTWARE ENGINEER AND DATA ANALYST
responsibilities: Development and implementation of analytical dashboards providing key performance indicators to health centers and administrators nationwide.
Implemented data validation and cleansing procedures to prevent inconsistencies and ensure the reliability of analytical results.
Development of robust, scalable systems from start to finish.
Maintain software updates in an Agile environment.

experience.title: DATA ANALYTICS INTERN
responsibilities: Developed and implemented an analytical dashboard providing key performance indicators to health centers and administrators nationwide.
Implemented data validation and cleansing procedures to prevent inconsistencies and ensure the reliability of analytical results.

experience.title: FRONT-END DEVELOPER
responsibilities: Handled the full-stack development of a company website using Next.js, from initial design to deployment and maintenance.
Developed a contact us page that sends email to the company with the message of the customers.
Leveraged NextJS and Tailwind CSS to build performant and maintainable front-end interfaces.

experience.title: FRONT-END DEVELOPER (FREELANCE)
responsibilities: Translated detailed Figma prototypes into responsive, cross-device compatible web applications, prioritizing optimal mobile performance.
Developed the website for easy integration, allowing seamless integration with backend services and third-party APIs.
Leveraged ReactJS and Tailwind CSS to build performant and maintainable front-end interfaces.

experience.title: BACK-END DEVELOPER (INTERN)
responsibilities: Engineered a comprehensive user management system capable of handling 10,000+ active users simultaneously.
Enhanced data security protocols that improved user data protection standards and ensured compliance with industry regulations.
Implemented key functionalities within the company's ERP system that streamlined data entry processes, resulting in a significant reduction in time spent on manual entries by team members.
